attributes.action: ensure that Government answers given to petitions actually address the points raised rather than seek to avoid the issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have received the Government responses to several petitions. None of them have directly addressed the issues raised and seem more interested in putting the Governments position in the most favourable light. Surely the Government should realise that the most of the Voters who use this site are more engaged in the political process and are deserving of an honest answer, rather than some smoke and mirrors fob off.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
